summary: A configurable U‑Net encoder‑decoder model that integrates Feature‑wise Linear Modulation (FiLM) layers to condition the segmentation process on auxiliary metadata, supporting both 2‑D and 3‑D inputs and offering adjustable depth, filter count, dropout and batch‑norm settings.
business_intent: Enable medical image segmentation models to leverage additional patient or study information alongside image data, improving diagnostic accuracy and adaptability across diverse clinical scenarios.
